mapper.select:
select count(tt.majorCode) as majorNumber , count(DISTINCT tt.universityId) as universityNumber from (select zz.id as majorCode,uu.id as universityId from zgk2.zgk_university_major_enrolling_plan_zj tmp INNER join zgk2.zgk_zj_3in7 zz on tmp.majorCode=zz.majorCode and tmp.universityId=zz.universityId INNER join zgk2.zgk_university uu on uu.id=tmp.universityId where 1=1 and tmp.areaId=#{areaId} and tmp.year=#{year}
and zz.selectCount!=0 and zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%')
and zz.selectCount=0
group by tmp.majorType,zz.eduLevel,tmp.universityId,zz.major ) tt

select uu.property as property,tmp.planEnrolling as planEnrolling from zgk2.zgk_university_major_enrolling_plan_zj tmp INNER join zgk2.zgk_zj_3in7 zz on tmp.majorCode=zz.majorCode and tmp.universityId=zz.universityId INNER join zgk2.zgk_university uu on uu.id=tmp.universityId where 1=1 and tmp.areaId=#{areaId} and tmp.year=#{year}
and zz.selectCount!=0 and zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%')
and zz.selectCount=0
and uu.property like CONCAT('%',#{property},'%')

select count(uu.property) from zgk2.zgk_university_major_enrolling_plan_zj tmp INNER join zgk2.zgk_zj_3in7 zz on tmp.majorCode=zz.majorCode and tmp.universityId=zz.universityId INNER join zgk2.zgk_university uu on uu.id=tmp.universityId where 1=1 and tmp.areaId=#{areaId} and tmp.year=#{year}
and zz.selectCount!=0 and zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%')
and zz.selectCount=0
and uu.property like CONCAT('%',#{property},'%')

select dd.name as batchName,sum(tmp.planEnrolling) as number from zgk2.zgk_university_major_enrolling_plan_zj tmp INNER join zgk2.zgk_zj_3in7 zz on tmp.majorCode=zz.majorCode and tmp.universityId=zz.universityId INNER join zgk2.zgk_university uu on uu.id=tmp.universityId left join zgk2.zgk_data_dict dd on dd.type='BATCHTYPE' and dd.dictId=tmp.batch where 1=1 and tmp.areaId=#{areaId} and tmp.year=#{year}
and zz.selectCount!=0 and zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%')
and zz.selectCount=0
group by tmp.batch

select bb.discipline_name as disciplineName,sum(tmp.planEnrolling) as number from zgk2.zgk_university_major_enrolling_plan_zj tmp INNER join zgk2.zgk_zj_3in7 zz on tmp.majorCode=zz.majorCode and tmp.universityId=zz.universityId INNER join zgk2.zgk_university uu on uu.id=tmp.universityId INNER join zgk2.zgk_major_base bb on bb.major_type=1 and bb.major_code=tmp.majorCode where 1=1 and tmp.areaId=#{areaId} and tmp.year=#{year}
and zz.selectCount!=0 and zz.selectSubject like CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%')
and zz.selectCount=0
group by bb.discipline_code
select dictId as id,name from zgk2.zgk_data_dict where type=#{type}

select dd.name as batchName,count(pp.majorCode) as majorNumber,sum(pp.planEnrolling) as planEnrollingNumber from zgk2.zgk_university_major_enrolling_plan_zj pp left join zgk2.zgk_data_dict dd on dd.type='BATCHTYPE' and dd.dictId=pp.batch where pp.areaId=#{areaId} and pp.year=#{year} and pp.majorCode is not null group by pp.batch;

select dd.name as batchName,count(DISTINCT pp.universityId) as universityNumber,sum(pp.planEnrolling) as planEnrollingNumber,pp.year as year from zgk2.zgk_university_major_enrolling_plan_zj pp left join zgk2.zgk_data_dict dd on dd.type='BATCHTYPE' and dd.dictId=pp.batch where pp.areaId=#{areaId} and pp.year=#{year} and pp.majorCode is not null group by pp.batch,pp.year

SELECT CONCAT(student_check_major1,'-',student_check_major2,'-',student_check_major3) AS 'group', count(CONCAT(student_check_major1,'-',student_check_major2,'-',student_check_major3)) AS stuNumber FROM ${table} WHERE student_grade LIKE CONCAT('%',#{grade},'%') GROUP BY student_check_major1,student_check_major2,student_check_major3

select count(*) from saas_tenant tt left join saas_tenant_config_instance ii on tt.id=ii.tn_id left join saas_configuration cc on ii.config_key=cc.id where ii.tn_id=#{tnId} and ii.domain=#{domain} and cc.en_name=#{enName}

select *,CONCAT(t1.student_check_major1,'-',t1.student_check_major2,'-',t1.student_check_major3) as student_major_type from ${tableName} t1
INNER JOIN ${classTableName} t2 on t1.student_grade=t2.class_grade and t1.student_class=t2.class_name
select (batch_1_enrolls+batch_2_enrolls+batch_3_enrolls)/stu_3_numbers as percent from saas_enrolling_ratio rr where tn_id=#{tnId} ORDER BY year desc limit 1
select ee.id from saas_exam ee where ee.tnId=#{tnId} and grade LIKE CONCAT('%',#{grade},'%') order by createDate DESC limit 1
select count(*) from saas_exam_detail dd where dd.examId=#{examId}
